General.Name: Fission Uranium Corp
General.Description: Fission Uranium Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of uranium resource properties in Canada. Its primary asset is the 100% owned Patterson Lake South property that consists of 17 contiguous mineral claims covering an area of approximately 31,039 hectares located in the Athabasca Basin region of Saskatchewan; and West Cluff property covering and area of 11,148 hectares located in the Western Athabasca Basin. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Kelowna, Canada.
General.Address: 1620 Dickson Avenue, Kelowna, BC, Canada, V1Y 9Y2
